name: Be the Guy
description: You play as a Guy who is trying to get through a cave except this is impossible for you to do alone. You face wide gaps of lava, impossible heights to scale, and various other obstacles that you cannot overcome, so what are you to do? Well, there is one special thing about you and that is that you're able to take control of other Guys who can pass these obstacles! So use those other guys to overcome obstacles and get through the cave and receive your reward!
